title: Cha A Er Zhong Nan Qin 501
synopsis: This is a cartoon born out of radio broadcasting. The two most influential radio anchors in the world: Zhang Yi and Tianming, transform into animated characters and take you into a different boys' bedroom. The lights are not turned off, the Internet is not turned off, and the water and power are not stopped. The two anchors had a special chat and talked wildly about the mountains. From catching bugs together when I was a child to playing around together; from Xiaobawang’s day red beauty to being robbed of coins in the coin room; from the hairstyle of the same table to the body shape of the same table. Every story makes you laugh in the bed until your stomach hurts. Countless memories, once youth, have too many resonances, let's relive the story of the bed in the bedroom with roommates. (translated from builibili)
